name: Crystallized Slab
description: Spin a shield of ice around you, absorbing up to 24791 damage from 3 projectiles.   Each time you absorb a projectile you restore 831 Magicka and launch an icy bolt back at the enemy, dealing 1799 Frost Damage and stunning them for 3 seconds. This effect can occur once every half second.
effectLines: Absorbing projectiles launches an icy bolt back at the enemy, damaging and stunning them.
coefDescription: Spin a shield of ice around you, absorbing up to $1 damage from 3 projectiles.   Each time you absorb a projectile you restore 831 Magicka and launch an icy bolt back at the enemy, dealing $2 Frost Damage and stunning them for 3 seconds. This effect can occur once every half second.
